# ---------------------- Paymaster V3 EPv8 ---------------------- #
npx ts-node script/deploy-zero/index.ts OPFPaymasterV3 \
  --open_loot_testnet \
  --optimism_sepolia \
  --sepolia \
  --base_sepolia \
  --clankermon

npx ts-node script/deploy-zero/verify-multi.ts \
  --address 0x8888FeEe400B4F959c07bf20d50ae4F5FF9AaAFA \
  --path src/PaymasterV3/OPFPaymasterV3.sol:OPFPaymasterV3 \
  --optimism_sepolia \
  --sepolia \
  --base_sepolia \
  --constructor 

forge verify-contract \
  --chain-id 510525 \
  --verifier blockscout \
  --verifier-url 'https://explorer.clankermon.com/api/' \
  --constructor-args  \
  --watch \
  0x8888FeEe400B4F959c07bf20d50ae4F5FF9AaAFA \
  src/PaymasterV3/OPFPaymasterV3.sol:OPFPaymasterV3

forge verify-contract \
  --rpc-url https://open-loot.rpc.testnet.syndicate.io/ \
  --verifier blockscout \
  --verifier-url 'https://open-loot.explorer.testnet.syndicate.io/api/' \
  --constructor-args  \
  --watch \
  0x8888FeEe400B4F959c07bf20d50ae4F5FF9AaAFA \
  src/PaymasterV3/OPFPaymasterV3.sol:OPFPaymasterV3
